custom-sql.sql: SELECT a.* FROM EVENTREG_Attendee a INNER JOIN EVENTREG_EventOption e ON e.eventOptionId = a.eventOptionId WHERE e.eventId = ?
SELECT DATE(registerDate) AS date, COUNT(attendeeId) AS total FROM EVENTREG_Attendee WHERE companyId = ? AND groupId = ? GROUP BY DATE(registerDate) ORDER BY DATE(registerDate) DESC

SELECT DATE(a.registerDate) AS date, COUNT(a.attendeeId) AS total FROM EVENTREG_Attendee a INNER JOIN EVENTREG_EventOption o ON a.eventOptionId = o.eventOptionId AND o.eventid = ? GROUP BY DATE(a.registerDate) ORDER BY DATE(a.registerDate) DESC
SELECT DATE(createDate) AS date, COUNT(eventId) AS total FROM EVENTREG_Event WHERE companyId = ? AND groupId = ? GROUP BY DATE(createDate) ORDER BY DATE(createDate) DESC

SELECT (SELECT SUM(seats) FROM EVENTREG_EventOption WHERE eventId = ?)-COUNT(a.attendeeId) AS seats FROM EVENTREG_EventOption o LEFT JOIN EVENTREG_Attendee a ON a.eventOptionId = o.eventOptionId WHERE o.eventId = ?;
SELECT MAX(o.seats)-COUNT(attendeeId) AS seats FROM EVENTREG_EventOption o LEFT JOIN EVENTREG_Attendee a ON a.eventOptionId = o.eventOptionId WHERE o.eventOptionId = ?
